title: Spittin' Chiclets Episode 407: Featuring Keith Yandle & Mason McTavish
description:
On Episode 407 of Spittinâ€™ Chiclets, the guys are joined by Keith Yandle and Mason McTavish. Keith joined for a major announcement regarding his future in the NHL, the Flyers locker room, and all the NHL news the guys missed this summer. The boys also make a major announcement regarding the NYPD vs FDNY hockey game. Then McTavish joined(1:11:43) to discuss his World Juniors heroics, the Ducks, playing with Bedard and more. The guys wrap up with some random topics, including a Grinds My Gears segment with Rear Admiral, Golf, and tons more.


You can find every episode of this show on Apple Podcasts, Spotify or YouTube. Prime Members can listen ad-free on Amazon Music. For more, visit barstool.link/schiclets
dc:creator: Barstool Sports
